entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
